data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 576,300 people living in Alibori through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alibori, Benin
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Alibori that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Alibori.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Alibori, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Songhai-Koyraboro people.
Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Alibori, Benin.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Alibori, Benin so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Alibori, Benin has a population of 576,300.

We estimate Alibori has 43,045 people who might know Jesus, 138,885 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 394,371 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Alibori, Benin to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.
